item.description:
Join us for TGIF, relax, unwind and shoot some pool. It's a fun and casual way to meet new people. We will reserve a number of tables accordingly per the rsvps. All levels of pool players are welcome. Come and tell us your latest stock tip or what your holiday plans are...

We have had quite a few new members join recently. It would be to meet and greet some of the new members. But of course all members new and old are welcome. We will play for about 2 -3 hours.

They do serve burgers, pizza & appetizers for those that would like to order some food. After pool, we can grab a quick bite or get some bubble tea @ Tea Infusions. There are many restaurants in the area and Tea Infusions serves some light appetizers also.



How to get there - you can take B train/green line to Packards Corner (Super 88 intersection) or 1 stop later at Harvard Ave and walk a couple of blocks to Big City.

Driving - parking is tough, but try Harvard Ave and Brighton Ave.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: TGIF - Pool
